ovdesc.p: This working file contains the result of the last comparison for a portfolio.

desc.p: Contains the number of cellular out of range counted in a grid.
No input field
Automatically updated by the AM.COMPARE whenever the compare process is launched
Identifies the key to the AM.LAST.COMPARE record.
Mandatory input
Automatically updated by the AM.BATCH.COMPARE whenever the process is launched.
Help Text for this field is unavailable. Please refer to the T24 User Guides for further information.
Help Text for this field is unavailable. Please refer to the T24 User Guides for further information.
Contains the number of cells that have an overdraft tracked in a comparison grid.
No input field
Generated by the comparison process
Contains the absolute value of the difference between the value of the DATA.TARGET field and the value of the MODEL.TARGET field, both belongs to the AM.GRID file.
This field contains in fact the sum of the difference in each cellular of the grid.
No input field
Automatically updated by the AM.COMPARE whenever the compare process is launched
Unique reference composed of the session number and the customer account.
No input field
Generated by the comparison process
Contains the last compare date of the portfolio.
No input field
automatically updated by the AM.COMPARE application whenever the compare process is launched
